summary: Complete website with admin system for Bevinamarada Ayurvedic Store - an Ayurvedic pharmacy management system with customer-facing website and comprehensive admin dashboard for stock, income tracking, and business management
architectural_notes: Mobile-first responsive design requirement - admin must manage from mobile
Two user roles: Admin (full access with login) and Customer (view-only, no login)
Ayurvedic theme: green/brown colors, Neem (Bevinamarada) inspiration
Future extensibility: online payment, GST reports, expiry tracking, supplier management, Kannada+English

existing_features.title: Implement secure admin authentication system with username and password login that restricts dashboard access to authenticated admin only
Create admin dashboard overview displaying today's income, monthly income, total income, total products count, out-of-stock products count, and total enquiries count with clear visual presentation

Build product management system allowing admin to add, edit, and delete products with fields for product name, category, price, and stock quantity, with automatic in-stock/out-of-stock status based on quantity
Implement sales and income reporting system with daily sales report, monthly sales report, and product-wise sales report accessible from admin dashboard
Create customer data management system to track customer name, phone number, order/enquiry history, and identify repeat customers
Implement stock alert system that warns admin when product quantity falls below configurable threshold (default 5 units)
Design customer home page with Ayurvedic theme featuring store introduction, trust message, call button, and WhatsApp button using natural green/brown color palette inspired by Neem (Bevinamarada)
Create About Us page displaying owner details, store history, and explanation of authentic Ayurveda practices
Build customer products page displaying product list with images, price, short description, and clear 'In Stock' or 'Out of Stock' labels
Create contact page with phone number, WhatsApp chat link, store address, Google map embed, and enquiry form for customer submissions
Ensure entire website is mobile-first and fully responsive, with admin dashboard optimized for mobile business management
Implement product image upload capability in admin product management, storing images as static assets and displaying them on customer products page

Apply a cohesive Ayurvedic visual design system across the entire customer website using natural green and brown tones, organic shapes, and typography that evokes traditional wellness and trust, with a clean layout optimized for product discovery and enquiries
Apply bold font weight to the login button text in the admin authentication screen at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/a[1]/button[1]

Customer home page with Ayurvedic theme, store intro, trust message, call/WhatsApp buttons
About Us page with owner details, store history, Ayurveda explanation
Products page with images, price, description, in-stock/out-of-stock labels
